title: How to Change Your Cursor Size and Color on a Chromebook

steps.title: Click the time.
steps.content: Click the time. You can find this at the bottom-right corner. A menu will open Alternatively, press Alt + Shift + s to quickly open the menu. [1] X Research source You can use the Chromebook's accessibility settings to change the cursor's size and color only. Keep in mind that these options may slow your computer .

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . This is the cog icon.

steps.title: Click Accessibility.
steps.content: Click Accessibility . You can find this in the left panel.

steps.title: Click Manage accessibility features.
steps.content: Click Manage accessibility features . A new page will open with a list of accessibility features and their settings.

steps.title: Click Mouse and touchpad.
steps.content: Click Mouse and touchpad . This will be below Keyboard and text input .

steps.title: Change the cursor color.
steps.content: Change the cursor color. Click the drop-down menu next to Cursor color . By default, it will be black. Select a new color to apply it.

steps.title: Toggle on "Show large mouse cursor" (optional).
steps.content: Toggle on "Show large mouse cursor" (optional). If you want a bigger cursor, toggle this option on. To add visibility to the cursor when it's in motion, toggle on Highlight the mouse cursor when it's moving .

steps.title: Download the Custom Cursor for Chrome extension.
steps.content: Download the Custom Cursor for Chrome extension. You can find this in the Chrome Web Store . Do the following: Click Add to Chrome In the pop-up window, click Add extension . Enable the extension if needed.

steps.title: Click the Custom Cursor for Chrome icon.
steps.content: Click the Custom Cursor for Chrome icon. You can find this to the right of the address bar. It will look like a cursor icon. A drop-down menu will open with an array of cursors.

steps.title: Click a new cursor to apply it.
steps.content: Click a new cursor to apply it. You can scroll through the popular options or click the magnifying glass icon to search for specific keywords. To change the size of the cursor, click the icon of the two overlapping cursors. To return to the default cursor, click the power button icon. You can also click Upload cursor to use a custom cursor .
